data.eml:eml: A contribution to the knowledge of scolopendromorph centipedes of Martinique Island, with descriptions of two new species (Chilopoda: Scolopendromorpha)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schileyko, Аrkаdy, Iorio, Etienne, Coulis, Mаthieu (2018): A contribution to the knowledge of scolopendromorph centipedes of Martinique Island, with descriptions of two new species (Chilopoda: Scolopendromorpha). Zootaxa 4486 (4): 559-574, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4486.4.9
